Registration

 

To register for AISTATS please complete the AISTATS registration form and return it to Premier Event Services.

 

Registration Fees Before Nov 19 After Nov 19
Students $260 $310
Regular $420 $470

Registration fees are listed here in US$ but will be charged in Barbados dollars at an exchange rate of 2:1 (BBD:USD).

See a list of accepted papers.

If you are travelling from Europe and having a difficult time finding flights, see the note in transportation.
